channel.title: Infento on Srikanth Perinkulam
channel.description: Recent content in Infento on Srikanth Perinkulam

item.title: 29 May 2023 00:00
item.description: Built out this cool scooter for S. Kinda neat how they’ve designed this - To turn, the rider needs to lean in the direction of the turn. Not sure if the kiddo will appreciate it. It sure did keep me busy for a couple hours!
item.content:encoded: Built out this cool scooter for S. Kinda neat how they’ve designed this - To turn, the rider needs to lean in the direction of the turn. Not sure if the kiddo will appreciate it. It sure did keep me busy for a couple hours!

item.title: 05 Jan 2022 00:00
item.description: Built this robust scooter for little S last evening. Absolutely love how intricate these infento kits can get. Kept both of us engaged for more than four hours. The scooter should keep her occupied for a few days…or not…
item.content:encoded: Built this robust scooter for little S last evening. Absolutely love how intricate these infento kits can get. Kept both of us engaged for more than four hours. The scooter should keep her occupied for a few days…or not…
